title: MINI - worldwide sales volume 2006 to 2018
summary: In general Sales in units has rose over the Year.
Sales in units is gradually increasing from 2006 to 2007, roughly constant from 2007 to 2008, and finally roughly increasing from 2008 to 2010.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2006 and 2007.
Maximum Sales in units, about 234175.0 was reported at Year 2010
The lowest Sales in units, of value 188077.0 was reported at Year 2006
